title: THEY'RE BACK, BABY! - 20 Minutes of Tears Part 1 w/ Brian & Greg
description:
Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unwanted subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Don’t miss One Piece on Netflix on August 31.

Greg's dusting off the dust off of his ancient Zelda save and Brian roasts him.  

Follow Brian on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brianaltano/

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
